translations.target: Sheet1
The Sacred Realm: The Boundless Emperor
Male-Oriented

translations.source: 昆仑派掌门升天前留下遗嘱，托付弟子守护大夏龙脉。掌门之位为无极圣皇，拥有特殊权力。掌门弟子遭遇南苑郡主强行带走，原是师尊指腹为婚的妻子。郡主带来结婚协议和国宝紫罗丹，欲与掌门弟子成婚。双方因误会和傲慢产生冲突。掌门弟子接到家书，得知父亲重病需回家。途中遇到武林盟主女儿的比武招亲大会，其妹小慈被迫参加。比武中，各路英雄挑战，赵臣宗师突破挑战极限，最终战胜扶桑人，赢得比武招亲。
translations.target: Before ascending to the heavens, the leader of the Kunlun Sect left a will, entrusting his disciple with guarding the Dragon Vein of Great Xia. The position of sect leader is known as the Boundless Sacred Emperor, endowed with special authority. The disciple, now the sect leader, is forcibly taken away by the Princess of Nanyuan, who turns out to be his betrothed wife arranged by their masters before birth. The princess brings a marriage agreement and the national treasure, the Violet Elixir, intending to marry the sect leader. Conflicts arise between them due to misunderstandings and pride. The sect leader receives a letter from home informing him of his father's critical illness, prompting his return. On the journey, he encounters a martial arts tournament held by the daughter of the Martial Alliance Leader to choose a husband, where his younger sister Xiaoci is forced to participate. During the tournament, heroes from all walks of life step up to challenge. Grandmaster Zhao Chen pushes past his limits and ultimately defeats a warrior from Fusang, winning the tournament and the hand in marriage.
Love Me One More Time, Mom
Female-Oriented

translations.source: 苏桐生来体弱得了脑瘤，压迫神经导致失明，恶父不救治反将其卖给人贩子，其母许温淑几度寻子，十八年后命运使得母女二人再次相见，可迎接她们的仍是各种艰难险阻
translations.target: Born frail and diagnosed with a brain tumor that caused blindness due to nerve compression, Su Tong was abandoned by her cruel father, who sold her to traffickers instead of seeking treatment. Her mother, Xu Wenshu, searched for her daughter for years. Eighteen years later, fate reunites them, but they continue to face relentless hardships.

translations.source: 被遗忘的星星（消逝的星光）
translations.target: The Forgotten Star (Fading Starlight)
Female-Oriented

translations.source: 黎雪发现女儿诺诺被独自留在熄火的车内，生命垂危，而丈夫刘斌却正与情人素素及其子亮亮游玩，拒接电话甚至误导救援。婆婆冷漠，希望孙女出事好让黎雪再孕产子。黎雪焦急寻女，屡遭挫折，甚至误砸他人车，情绪崩溃，这时助理林川传来了找到刘斌车子的消息……
translations.target: Li Xue discovers her daughter Nuonuo left alone in a stalled car, fighting for her life, while her husband Liu Bin is out enjoying himself with his mistress Susu and her son Liangliang, ignoring calls and even misleading rescue efforts. Her cold-hearted mother-in-law secretly hopes the granddaughter dies so Li Xue can try for a son. Desperate to find her child, Li Xue faces repeated setbacks, even mistakenly smashing a stranger’s car in her panic. Just as she reaches her breaking point, her assistant Lin Chuan sends word that Liu Bin’s car has been located...
《Mr. Fu's Obsessive Love》（A Love Beyond Redemption）
Female-Oriented

translations.source: 两年后，顾清雨被冤枉找人玷污傅廷也未婚妻一事出狱，被傅廷也强行带走，本想找两个混混为自己报仇，可于心不忍在中途叫停，并和沈遇喝酒时被他下药，阴差阳错与顾清雨发生了关系，为了报仇让顾家破产清算，恰在此时顾老重病住院，不得已去求傅廷也借钱，而傅廷也为了吸引舒梦出现答应了，借此与顾清雨假结婚发生了一系列相爱相杀的事情
translations.target: Two years later, Gu Qingyu is released from prison after being wrongfully accused of hiring men to assault Fu Tingye's fiancée. She is forcibly taken away by Fu Tingye. Initially intending to hire thugs for revenge, she has a change of heart and calls it off midway. While drinking with Shen Yu, she is drugged by him and, through a twist of fate, ends up in bed with Gu Qingyu. To exact revenge, Fu Tingye bankrupts the Gu family. At this critical moment, Mr. Gu falls seriously ill and is hospitalized. With no other choice, Gu Qingyu begs Fu Tingye for a loan. To lure Shu Meng out of hiding, Fu Tingye agrees, leading to a fake marriage with Gu Qingyu and a series of love-hate conflicts.

translations.source: 女总裁的复仇（复仇女神）
translations.target: The CEO's Vengeance（Goddess of Retribution）
Female-Oriented

translations.source: 女主姜婉兮回国后得知姐姐死讯，为了调查姐姐死因，选择封锁消息并且假扮姐姐身份回到婆家查找线索。扮演姐姐身份后，才发现这一家子对姐姐竟是非人待遇，女主决定在查找真凶之时也要严惩这群恶人
translations.target: After returning to China and learning of her sister's death, Jiang Wanxi decides to investigate the cause. She chooses to conceal the news and assumes her sister's identity to return to her in-laws' home in search of clues. Upon stepping into her sister's role, she discovers the family subjected her sister to inhumane treatment. Determined to find the real culprit, the heroine also resolves to punish these wrongdoers severely.

translations.source: 《回到古代当昏君》（穿越求死路）
translations.target: Back to Ancient Times as a Tyrant (Transmigration: The Path to Death)
Male-Oriented

translations.source: 荣宇是勤勤恳恳想要通过做好事成仙的人，穿越到大燕昏君的身上后知道求死也能成仙，便开启了艰难的“求死”之路，在这一路爱上了刺杀他的女主舒亦君，并给昏君的口碑带来了惊人的逆转，成为远近闻名、十里八乡人人夸的一代明君。
translations.target: Rong Yu, a diligent man striving to become immortal through good deeds, transmigrates into the body of a tyrannical emperor of the Great Yan Dynasty. Upon learning that seeking death can also lead to immortality, he embarks on a challenging "quest for death." Along the way, he falls in love with Shu Yijun, the female assassin sent to kill him, and astonishingly reverses the tyrant's reputation, becoming a widely praised and renowned wise ruler celebrated far and wide.
Autumn Locked in the Cold Palace
Female-Oriented

translations.source: 在大成皇朝，王皇子盛明轩登基，丞相之女文清秋功不可没，本将册封为后。然而，表妹宁媚儿指控文清秋谋害宁妃，并出示证据，导致文丞相一家被囚，文清秋亦身陷囹圄。面对重重困境，文清秋誓要揭开真相，为家人洗清冤屈。她不仅要面对皇权与阴谋的较量，还要探寻皇室深处的秘密。这是一部充满智慧、勇气与爱情的宫廷大戏，文清秋的命运将如何演变，敬请期待。
translations.target: In the Great Cheng Dynasty, Prince Sheng Mingxuan ascends the throne with the help of Wen Qingqiu, the daughter of the prime minister, who is to be crowned empress. However, her cousin Ning Mei'er accuses Wen Qingqiu of murdering Consort Ning and presents evidence, leading to the imprisonment of the Wen family and Wen Qingqiu herself. Faced with overwhelming adversity, Wen Qingqiu vows to uncover the truth and clear her family's name. She must navigate the power struggles and conspiracies of the royal court while uncovering deep-seated secrets within the imperial family. This is a palace drama filled with wisdom, courage, and love. How will Wen Qingqiu's fate unfold? Stay tuned.

translations.source: 渣男前夫为何跪地求饶
translations.target: Why Is the Ex-Husband Begging on His Knees
Female-Oriented

translations.source: 林氏集团老丈人去世，女儿期待女婿出席葬礼，却迟迟未见身影。传言女婿陆长江不参加葬礼，反而去机场接一名女子，引发外界对其不忠的猜测。女儿面对记者的追问，坚定表示信任丈夫，认为他不是这样的人。然而，随着更多证据浮现，女儿与丈夫间的信任出现裂痕。在葬礼现场，女儿情绪激动，质问丈夫为何不参加父亲的葬礼，反而去接别的女人。丈夫试图解释，但未能平息妻子的怒火。妻子决心亲自追问丈夫真相，若他真的背叛了自己，便坚决离婚。同时，围绕丈夫的行为，家庭内部矛盾升级，外界的猜测与质疑也未曾停歇。
translations.target: After the death of the Lin family patriarch, his daughter eagerly awaits her husband's presence at the funeral, but he is nowhere to be seen. Rumors spread that her husband, Lu Changjiang, skipped the funeral to pick up another woman at the airport, sparking speculation about his infidelity. Faced with reporters' questions, the daughter firmly expresses her trust in her husband, insisting he is not that kind of person. However, as more evidence emerges, cracks begin to form in their trust. At the funeral, the daughter confronts her husband emotionally, demanding to know why he missed her father's funeral to meet another woman. Despite his attempts to explain, he fails to calm her anger. Determined to uncover the truth, she vows to divorce him if he has truly betrayed her. Meanwhile, family tensions escalate over his actions, and public suspicion continues to grow.

translations.source: 风流小神医和四个绝色师姐
translations.target: The Flirty Young Miracle Doctor and His Four Stunning Senior Sisters
Male-Oriented

translations.source: 神医殿被蛊王攻陷，老殿主失踪，新任殿主叶凡也因重伤失忆流落民间，却又遭未婚妻孔雪背叛跌落高楼，多重刺激下叶凡恢复记忆，但因旧日伤未愈，武力值不足，处处被蛊王势力掣肘。叶凡为了找寻老殿主下落和治疗伤势，带着一纸婚约找上上官家，想借助纯阴之体疗伤，却屡陷阴谋，遭遇迫害
translations.target: The Divine Physician Hall is overrun by the Venom King, with the old master missing. The new master, Ye Fan, loses his memory after being severely wounded and ends up living among ordinary people. Betrayed by his fiancée, Kong Xue, he falls from a tall building. Amidst these shocks, Ye Fan regains his memories, but his old injuries remain unhealed, leaving him weakened and constantly hindered by the Venom King's forces. In search of the old master and a cure for his wounds, Ye Fan approaches the Shangguan family with a marriage contract, hoping to heal through a pure Yin constitution. However, he repeatedly falls into traps and faces persecution.

translations.source: 总裁你的闺女被虐惨了（总裁千金劫）
translations.target: CEO, Your Daughter Is Suffering (The CEO's Daughter in Peril)
Female-Oriented

translations.source: 江家男子向妻子索要钱财，仅得到十元后不满地咒骂，表示需要三万块钱并声称会再想办法。妻子劝他别再赌博，却遭到丈夫的怒斥和指责，称是家中的女儿导致了江家家底亏空。此时，伟哥到访，江家男子慌忙迎接，伟哥提及他欠下的三万块钱债务，江家男子请求宽限两天，但被伟哥拒绝。伟哥注意到江家男子的妻子貌美，提出不当建议，江家男子竟默许。随后，伟哥又盯上了他们年幼且长相水灵的女儿，提出让女儿抵债，江家男子犹豫后竟表示听从。女儿惊恐呼救，场面危急。此时，有人称呼乔总好，家政人员也打招呼，另一女子得到小兵的消息，表现出惊喜。
translations.target: A man from the Jiang family demanded money from his wife, but only received ten yuan. Dissatisfied, he cursed, claiming he needed thirty thousand yuan and vowed to find another way. His wife urged him to stop gambling, but he angrily rebuked her, blaming their daughter for draining the family's finances. At that moment, Brother Wei arrived, and the man hurriedly greeted him. Brother Wei mentioned the thirty thousand yuan debt, and the man pleaded for a two-day extension, which Brother Wei refused. Noticing the man's beautiful wife, Brother Wei made an inappropriate suggestion, to which the man silently agreed. Brother Wei then set his sights on their young, lovely daughter, proposing she be used to settle the debt. After a moment of hesitation, the man agreed. The terrified daughter cried for help, creating a tense situation. Suddenly, someone greeted "Mr. Qiao," and a housekeeper also offered a greeting. Another woman, upon receiving news from Xiao Bing, showed delight.

translations.source: 《带娃离婚后，首富千金瞒不住了》
translations.target: Hidden Heiress: Starting Over After Divorce
Female-Oriented

translations.source: 选择离婚带着孩子离开。离婚后，由于某些机缘巧合，她首富千金的身份不再能隐瞒，随之而来的是一系列的变化，比如她可能利用家族的财富和资源开始新的生活，让曾经看不起她的人刮目相看，同时也可能面临着一些新的挑战和情感纠葛。
translations.target: She chooses to divorce and leave with her child. After the divorce, due to certain coincidences, her identity as the heiress of a wealthy family can no longer be concealed. This leads to a series of changes: she may leverage her family's wealth and resources to start a new life, earning the respect of those who once looked down on her, while also facing new challenges and emotional entanglements.
The Obsessive Mr. Wen's Powerful Lady
Female-Oriented

translations.source: 她美丽纤弱，他派无数暗卫保护，却发现众暗卫接不过她一招~
translations.target: She is beautiful and delicate, so he sends countless secret guards to protect her, only to discover that none of them can withstand a single move from her~

translations.source: 《满级甜诱!在傅爷怀里声色撩人》
translations.target: Sweet Seduction Max! In Mr. Fu's Embrace
Female-Oriented

translations.source: 女明星姜予漾爱慕V神已久，做梦都是V神，而现实中的从未谋面的未婚夫傅以泽，因为爷爷辈的恩情，要求姜予漾跟傅家结姻，可是傅以泽早在一年前就跟沈心柔勾搭在一起，沈心柔靠着傅以泽在娱乐圈如鱼得水，某一天傅以泽见到了路过的姜予漾，对她一见倾心，而姜予漾想方设法取消这门婚事。
translations.target: Actress Jiang Yuyang has long admired the mysterious V-God, dreaming of him constantly. Meanwhile, her unseen fiancé, Fu Yize, demands she marry into the Fu family due to a generational debt of gratitude. Unbeknownst to her, Fu Yize has been secretly involved with Shen Xinrou for a year, helping her thrive in the entertainment industry. One day, Fu Yize catches sight of Jiang Yuyang passing by and is instantly captivated, while she devises every possible way to call off this arranged marriage.
CEO Shao, My Wife is Live-Streaming Dates Again
Female-Oriented

translations.source: 邵太太为了引起邵总的注意，再次去直播相亲，两人之间的爱情故事充满趣味和甜蜜。
translations.target: To catch CEO Shao's attention, Mrs. Shao goes live-streaming dates again, sparking a fun and sweet love story between them.
The Dragon Gate Son-in-Law
Male-Oriented

translations.source: 醉卧美人膝醒掌大权，谁人不服
translations.target: Drunk on a beauty's lap, awake with power in hand—who dares to defy?

translations.source: 《辞职后前总裁对我余情未了》
translations.target: The Ex-CEO's Lingering Affection
Female-Oriented

translations.source: 宋襄是严总的私人秘书负责严总的一切，却发现严总只是把她作为工具弃之如履于是她决定离开，严总没想到前总裁竟开始穷追不舍.
translations.target: As CEO Yan's personal secretary, Song Xiang managed every aspect of his life, only to realize she was merely a disposable tool. Deciding to leave, she never expected her former boss would start relentlessly pursuing her.

translations.source: 顾总的隐婚娇妻是女帝
translations.target: CEO Gu's Secretly Wedded Empress
Male-Oriented

translations.source: 女帝穿越现代竟穿成霸道总裁的隱婚娇妻？总裁老公要离婚，女帝却把他当男宠
translations.target: The Empress Transmigrates to Modern Times and Becomes the Secretly Wedded Wife of a CEO? When the CEO Demands a Divorce, She Treats Him as Her Royal Consort

translations.source: 救命，魔尊大人把我宠上天
translations.target: Help! The Demon Lord Spoils Me to the Heavens
Female-Oriented

translations.source: 网文作家李蕙娇在许愿时意外召唤出了自己书中的大反派赤弦魔尊厉苍云，厉苍云为回到书中决定为李蕙娇实现愿望，帮她追求她暗恋已久的霸总涂梓浩。然而当霸总真的爱上自己时，李蕙娇才发现自己喜欢的人是厉苍云。
translations.target: Web Novelist Li Huijiao accidentally summons Chi Xian, the Demon Lord Li Cangyun, the main antagonist from her own novel, while making a wish. To return to his story, Li Cangyun decides to grant Li Huijiao's wish by helping her pursue the domineering CEO Tu Zihao, whom she has long had a crush on. However, when the CEO actually falls for her, Li Huijiao realizes that her true feelings are for Li Cangyun.
Desert Storm
Male-Oriented

translations.source: 天狼卫首领、北漠狼王沈天君凯旋回归后却发现自己父亲被害，沈氏集团被二叔沈人凤联合三大家族夺走，妻子慕筱也被迫要改嫁给程家大少。狼王沈天君一怒之下以一己之力摧枯拉朽瓦解梁、程、欧阳三大家族，击败二叔夺回集团，为父报仇，并与妻子破镜重圆。
translations.target: After triumphantly returning as the leader of the Tianlang Guard and the Wolf King of the Northern Desert, Shen Tianjun discovers that his father has been murdered, the Shen Group has been seized by his second uncle Shen Renfeng in alliance with three powerful families, and his wife Mu Xiao is being forced to marry the eldest son of the Cheng family. Enraged, Wolf King Shen Tianjun single-handedly dismantles the Liang, Cheng, and Ouyang families, defeats his second uncle to reclaim the group, avenges his father, and reconciles with his wife.
Mr. Chi, Your Wife Wants a Divorce
Female-Oriented

translations.source: 结婚三年，他却在她的生日当天约会白月光，她当场提出离婚！他却以为她是欲情故纵的把戏，直到他得知她去酒吧点了男人.
translations.target: After three years of marriage, he chose to meet his first love on her birthday. She immediately demanded a divorce! He thought it was just a game of playing hard to get, until he discovered she had hired male escorts at a bar.
Seeking Pleasure
Female-Oriented

translations.source: 大夏国的长公主吴欢，心狠手辣，把持朝政已久，皇帝早已心生不满，预谋刺杀吴欢，而吴欢为皇帝扫清障碍，一切都是为了皇帝，到头来被亲自送给皇帝的刀所杀，她不甘心就这样死去，她的执念带她穿越到了现代她看到了与自己长得一模一样的吴迪，和端王浩炎长相一样的顾浩炎。吴迪是一个神秘编剧，作为《长公主》的编剧与三金影帝顾浩炎结婚，吴迪以为自己嫁给了爱情放弃了事业，实则婚后是冷漠相待，和无尽的等待，吴迪的忍气吞声，却遭到了顾浩炎背叛了吴迪，季雨婷派人羞辱吴迪，导致了吴迪的死亡。
translations.target: Wu Huan, the formidable Grand Princess of the Great Xia Kingdom, has long held the reins of power, much to the Emperor's growing resentment. He plots her assassination. Unbeknownst to him, every obstacle Wu Huan removed was for his sake. In the end, she is killed by the very blade she gifted him. Refusing to accept such an unjust death, her lingering obsession transports her soul to the modern era. There, she encounters Wu Di, a woman who looks exactly like her, and Gu Haoyan, who bears an uncanny resemblance to Prince Duan Haoyan. Wu Di is a mysterious screenwriter who married triple-crown film emperor Gu Haoyan after working on the drama "The Grand Princess." Believing she had found true love, Wu Di abandoned her career, only to face cold indifference and endless waiting in her marriage. Her silent endurance was met with betrayal by Gu Haoyan. Humiliated by agents of Ji Yuting, Wu Di meets her demise.

translations.source: 吴欢的灵魂穿越千年，到了吴迪的身上，获取了吴迪所有的记忆和情感，吴迪和吴欢两个灵魂的交流，双方达成协议，彼此都心怀怨恨，吴迪让吴欢成为她，吴欢势要为伤害过吴迪的人，付出代价。吴迪在这一刻重生了，开启了一系列的报复计划，与顾浩炎进行谈判想要离婚。陆寻凭借《长公主1》，获得了最佳男主角，无意中救下了中了迷药的吴迪，陆寻曾经的恋人，背叛了陆寻选择了顾浩炎，最后嫁给了顾浩炎的大哥(顾浩淼)。陆寻和吴迪联手撕渣男渣女，曾经伤害过他们的人，让他们通通付出代价。
translations.target: Wu Huan's soul, traversing millennia, merges with Wu Di's body, inheriting all her memories and emotions. The two souls commune, united by shared resentment. Wu Di allows Wu Huan to become her, and Wu Huan vows to make those who wronged Wu Di pay. Reborn in this moment, Wu Di embarks on a series of calculated revenges, confronting Gu Haoyan to demand a divorce. Lu Xun, who won Best Actor for his role in "The Grand Princess I," inadvertently rescues Wu Di after she is drugged. His former lover, who betrayed him for Gu Haoyan, ultimately married Gu Haoyan's elder brother (Gu Haomiao). Lu Xun and Wu Di join forces to expose and dismantle the toxic men and women who betrayed them, ensuring every wrongdoer faces the consequences.
"Jiangxia Chronicles: The Golden Duo"
Male-Oriented

translations.source: 盛子浩盛世集团的继承人，因不学无术被放养到乌龙泉，并要求三个月内带着乌龙泉振兴发展，否则就不能得到盛家资产。在阴差阳错下带领乌龙泉发展的人被错认成了黄旺，于是在黄旺盛子浩和乌龙泉的村民们之间展开了新的故事
translations.target: Sheng Zihao, heir to the Shengshi Group, is sent to Wulongquan due to his lack of ambition and given three months to revitalize the area, or risk losing his family inheritance. By a twist of fate, Huang Wang is mistakenly credited for leading Wulongquan's development, sparking a new story between Huang Wang, Sheng Zihao, and the villagers of Wulongquan.
"The Tyrant of Qin"
Male-Oriented

translations.source: 设计师陈羽一朝穿越至秦朝，没想到落地就被抓去修长城，陈羽叫苦连天之际忽然听闻始皇嬴政病重，能替其治病者有重赏，陈羽揭下皇榜却被赵高的人追杀，幸亏他逃进大皇子扶苏的宫殿才得留一命，觐见始皇，但赵高心怀毒计意欲让陈羽与方士斗法，害死陈羽，却没想到陈羽精通数理化，在打脸方士的同时，还巧妙的将身上的消炎药献了出去……
translations.target: Designer Chen Yu suddenly finds himself transported back to the Qin Dynasty, only to be captured and forced to work on the Great Wall. Just as he is lamenting his fate, he hears that Emperor Qin Shi Huang is gravely ill and is offering a hefty reward to anyone who can cure him. Chen Yu takes down the imperial notice, but is pursued by Zhao Gao's men. He narrowly escapes by fleeing into the palace of Crown Prince Fusu, where he is granted an audience with the emperor. However, Zhao Gao harbors malicious intentions and schemes to pit Chen Yu against court alchemists in a duel, hoping to get him killed. To everyone's surprise, Chen Yu, with his mastery of mathematics, physics, and chemistry, not only exposes the alchemists but also cleverly presents his own anti-inflammatory medicine...
